dcterms:description: A Cantonese audio-visual speech dataset for in-car command recognition, containing 4,984 samples of 200 unique commands recorded by 30 native Cantonese speakers. The dataset includes both clean and augmented versions with common in-car background noises.
dcterms:title: CI-AVSR
